name: American Living Striped Boat-Neck Top
description: Show your style stripes in American Living's perfectly-printed boat-neck top! Pair with white pants or shorts for a nautical feel.

name: Callaway Razr Solid Performance Golf Polo
description: The Callaway Razr solid performance polo is the ultimate grab-and-go staple solid. Stock up on them all for a wear anywhere color assortment. Available in fourteen core colors, all featuring Chevron logo rubber patch and moisture wicking.

name: Alfani Jacket Solid Black Slim Fit
description: A slim, updated construction makes this smooth suit jacket from Alfani a great addition to your tailored wardrobe.
